subject: This office is responsible for
body:
This office is responsible for the sole purpose of resolving Unclaimed
and Lost Money owned to companies and individuals which have been
delayed due to  carelessness in the apex  Bank and poor Government
policies  .
However ,In accordance with the licensing and supervision of banking
directive, 
a specified file registered in your favor under your email
account has been certified and approved by the federal authorities for
the Financial Services Compensation scheme 1.2 Million usd  .
You are advice to  Kindle provide us with your complete
Legal name................
Direct telephone ...............................
and Postal address..................... to enable us process the
release of the funds for cash withdrawal  at your local Bank in your
area .
Enabling You First
Mr. Osborne Michel.
Debt Reconciliation Commission
Cable Add:  NY 10017 USA.
osbornemichel438@gmail.com

subject: Re: This office is responsible for
body:
Hello Mr. Osborne Michel,

Thank you for reaching out and providing this information. It's quite interesting to hear about the Unclaimed and Lost Money owned to companies. I'm curious, how does this process usually work? And what kind of issues have been caused by poor Government policies?

I'm also intrigued by the Financial Services scheme Million usd you mentioned. Could you please elaborate more on that? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Asha
